row._WebConfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?><!DOCTYPE Content [ <!ELEMENT Content ( PARAMETER ) >
<!ELEMENT GDVVERM_BUSIDATE EMPTY > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_BUSIDATE BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "Leer=Tagesdatum" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_BUSIDATE PLAUSI CDATA "JJJJMMTT" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_BUSIDATE SEPPL CDATA "WIPE" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_BUSIDATE WERT CDATA "" >
<!ELEMENT GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG EMPTY > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "GDVVERM: Lieferung" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG PLAUSI CDATA "GN" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG SEPPL CDATA "WIPE" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG WERT CDATA "G" >
<!ELEMENT GDVVERM_PID EMPTY > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_PID BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "GDVVERM: PID" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_PID PLAUSI CDATA "NNNN" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_PID SEPPL CDATA "WIPE" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_PID WERT CDATA "" >
<!ELEMENT GDVVERM_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "GDVVERM: Test" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "JN" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_TEST SEPPL CDATA "WIPE" > <!ATTLIST GDVVERM_TEST WERT CDATA "N" >
<!ELEMENT PARAMETER ( UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST, GDVVERM_BUSIDATE, GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG, GDVVERM_PID, GDVVERM_TEST ) >
<!ELEMENT UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "ALLGEMEIN: UC4 Deployment Test" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "JN" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "WIE" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "N" >
]> <Content>
<PARAMETER>
<UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="ALLGEMEIN: UC4 Deployment Test" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="WIE" WERT="N"/> <GDVVERM_BUSIDATE BESCHREIBUNG="Leer=Tagesdatum" PLAUSI="JJJJMMTT" SEPPL="WIPE" WERT=""/> <GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG BESCHREIBUNG="GDVVERM: Lieferung" PLAUSI="GN" SEPPL="WIPE" WERT="G"/> <GDVVERM_PID BESCHREIBUNG="GDVVERM: PID" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="WIPE" WERT=""/> <GDVVERM_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="GDVVERM: Test" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="WIPE" WERT="N"/>
</PARAMETER>
</Content>

row.process:
:INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS ! ----------------------------------------------------------------- ! Sicherstellung der Abfolge: ! GDV-Vermittlerupdate -> DisDa-Export -> DisDa-Import -> GDV-Batch ! ----------------------------------------------------------------- :IF &IDT# = "P" : SET &ParentType# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYPE(ACT) : IF &ParentType# <> "USER" : ATTACH_SYNC &ME_RUNNR#, "SYNC.BBS.GDV", "START_GDV_VERMUPDATE", "ENDE_GDV_VERMUPDATE", "ENDE_GDV_VERMUPDATE", "W" : ELSE : SET &CurrentSyncValue# = GET_SYNC("SYNC.BBS.GDV", "STATE") : IF &CurrentSyncValue# <> "GDV_BEENDET" : BEGINREAD : PRINT "Sync Status is nicht wie erwartet: &CurrentSyncValue# !!!", "" : PRINT "OK um Jobplan trotzdem laufen zu lassen.", "" : ENDREAD : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrÃ¼ckt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &GDVVERM_BUSIDATE#,,"GDVVERM_BUSIDATE [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG#,,"GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG [GN]",'G',K :READ &GDVVERM_PID#,,"GDVVERM_PID [NNNN]",'',K :READ &GDVVERM_TEST#,,"GDVVERM_TEST [JN]",'N',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &GDVVERM_BUSIDATE# = &GDVVERM_BUSIDATE# :PSET &GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG# = &GDVVERM_LIEFERUNG# :PSET &GDVVERM_PID# = &GDVVERM_PID# :PSET &GDVVERM_TEST# = &GDVVERM_TEST# !**************End of GeneratedText************** :IF &GDVVERM_BUSIDATE# = "" : PSET &GDVVERM_BUSIDATE# = &DATUM_AM# :ENDIF
